import React from 'react'; import './SubscriptionPlans.css'; const SubscriptionPlans = () => { const plans = [ { id: 1, name: 'Basic', price: 'Free', description: 'Perfect for getting started', features: [ '5 Predictions/Month', 'Basic Analytics', 'Property Search', 'Email Support' ], buttonText: 'Get Started', buttonVariant: 'secondary', popular: false }, { id: 2, name: 'Professional', price: '$599.00', description: 'For serious property investors', features: [ 'Unlimited Predictions', 'Advanced Analytics', 'Market Reports', 'Priority Support', 'Custom Alerts', 'Data Export' ], buttonText: 'Get Started', buttonVariant: 'secondary', popular: false }, { id: 3, name: 'Premium', price: '$999.00', description: 'Complete solution for professionals', features: [ 'All Professional Features', 'Dedicated Support', 'API Access', 'Custom Integrations', 'White-label Options', 'Advanced Reporting', 'Team Management' ], buttonText: 'Get Started', buttonVariant: 'primary', popular: true } ]; return (

Find The Right Plan For You

Choose a plan that fits your needs and unlock exclusive features.

{plans.map((plan) => (
{plan.popular && (
Most Popular
)}

{plan.name}

{plan.price} {plan.price !== 'Free' && /month}

))}
); }; export default SubscriptionPlans;
